summary: Senior Software Engineer with proven expertise in applied AI and modern frontend architectures. Applied AI Hackathon winner, demonstrating ability to rapidly build functional AI-powered solutions with MCP servers and conversational interfaces. Track record of taking concepts from prototype to production using Bolt.new and Lovable for rapid iteration, then integrating into enterprise systems. Specializes in solving complex architectural challenges, including implementing MicroFrontend solutions to unify disparate technology stacks.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Architected and implemented MicroFrontend solution using SingleSPA to unify multiple products built in different JS technologies (React, Angular), eliminating dependency on legacy product architecture and enabling independent deployment.
Won company-wide Applied AI Hackathon as team lead and idea creator, building conversational agent with MCP server and chat interface that automated common user workflows in 2 days.
Unified the UI of multiple products by creating a native web component Lit-based design system.
Led 20-member pod as the Scrum Master to manage sprint planning and execution.

Served as team admin identifying and championing adoption of cutting-edge AI coding tools, leading multiple iterations from Codeium Windsurf to Claude Code, accelerating productivity across engineering department.

experience.title: Lead Software Engineer, Frontend
responsibilities: Led development of B2B portal for customizing conversational AI chatbot, enhancing features and performance.
Developed no-code Canvas drag-and-drop solution for building reply flows.
Implemented robust CI/CD pipeline using Vite, Netlify, and GitHub Actions.
Directed all frontend work, leading a team of five engineers.
Translated high-fidelity mocks into actionable tasks with weekly releases.
Collaborated with Head of Product Management and Head of Design to align priorities.
Conducted bi-weekly meetings to support team members' professional development.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed a design system with native web components using Lit for a conversational AI chatbot product.
Authored technical design documents for a new B2B customer portal supporting the AI chatbot.
Built MVP of the B2B customer portal and created tickets for future enhancements.
Proactively implemented a user feedback system using Netlify forms, Zapier, and Linear APIs to improve product development cycle.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Maintained and integrated Router Limits technologies after acquisition.
Migrated front-end pages to a new UI kit and took ownership of Bark React Native app development.

experience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Led frontend development for a small software company.
Developed Android and iOS apps using C# with Xamarin forms.
Created a complex AngularJS progressive web app with Node mySQL REST API integration.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.company: Lockheed Martin Mission Systems and Training
responsibilities: Contributed to F-14 training simulation software using C# .NET and WPF.

experience.title: Full Stack Programmer
responsibilities: Developed a missionary chat application for Mormon.org with Java Spring and Oracle SQL backend.
Worked in an Agile Scrum environment using Jira for sprint management.

skills.Computer_Science: Excellent object-oriented programming background. Passionate for great UX. Experienced with JavaScript, Typescript, React, Angular, Lit, HTML, SASS, Node, mySQL, Postgres, Firebase, AWS, Docker, Netlify, Vite, Webpack, Storybook, Figma, SingleSPA. Comfortable with React Native, Xamarin, Flutter, C#, Java, Python, Ruby. Applied AI expertise with Claude Code, Codeium Windsurf, Model Context Protocol (MCP), Bolt.new, and Lovable for rapid concept-to-prototype-to-production development. Proven track record taking AI-assisted prototypes and integrating them into production systems.
skills.Personal_and_Communication: Autonomous self-starter. Consistent positive 'Let's do it!' attitude. Have worked on distributed teams for over five years. Experienced in handling technical customer support, collections, and physical transactions. Developed communication skills through years of management experience in the workplace.
